co.cask.cdap.api.service.http

Interface HttpServiceHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCubeHttpHandler, AbstractHttpServiceHandler

    public interface HttpServiceHandler
    Interface to be implemented to handle HTTP requests. This interface can be implemented and passed along to custom user services. Classes that implement this interface can add methods with the @Path annotation to specify the endpoint which that method handles. It can also use the @GET, @POST, @PUT, @DELETE annotations to specify the type of HTTP requests that it handles. Example: 

    
      public class MyHttpHanlder implements HttpServiceHandler {

        @GET
        @Path("/ping")
        public void process(HttpServiceRequest request, HttpServiceResponder responder) {
          responder.sendString("Hello World");
        }

        @Override
        public void configure(HttpServiceConfigurer configurer) { }

        @Override
        public void initialize(HttpServiceContext context) throws Exception { }

        @Override
        public void destroy() { }
      }

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configure(HttpServiceConfigurer configurer)
      Configures this HttpServiceHandler with the given HttpServiceConfigurer.
      void destroy()
      Invoked after the Custom User Service using this HttpServiceHandler is destroyed.
      void initialize(HttpServiceContext context)
      Invoked when the Custom User Service using this HttpServiceHandler is initialized.

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        void configure(HttpServiceConfigurer configurer)
        Configures this HttpServiceHandler with the given HttpServiceConfigurer. This method is invoked at deployment time.
        Parameters:
        configurer - the HttpServiceConfigurer which is used to configure this Handler

      • initialize

        void initialize(HttpServiceContext context)
                throws Exception
        Invoked when the Custom User Service using this HttpServiceHandler is initialized. This method can be used to initialize any user related resources at runtime.
        Parameters:
        context - the HTTP service runtime context
        Throws:
        Exception

      • destroy

        void destroy()
        Invoked after the Custom User Service using this HttpServiceHandler is destroyed. Use this method to perform any necessary cleanup.
